Identity.Name: Celintran Temple Guard
Identity.Basic_Description: lightly armed knights with a sword on their hip and a glowing blue 'aura' spear in their hands

Abilities.Name: Aura Javelin
Abilities.Ability: Once pergame as an action, Celintran Temple Guard can perform an attackwith up to 7 range. If that attack deal damage, Celintran Temple Guard may move directly adjacent to the targeted unit.
